description: Tied to a St. Andrew's cross for all of San Francisco's most twisted perverts to watch, Cass Bolton becomes a porcupine as clothespins cover his entire back side. With his screams mix with the cheers from the hungry Folsom Street Fair crowd, Sebastian Keys, Jessie Colter and Christian Wilde tag team their way through a brutal torment on Cass. Cass takes the cat o'nine tails, a double flogging and the taser only inches away from strangers in broad daylight. Of course, this is only a side trip for Cass, as his doms soon steal him away to a hardcore party in the Armory. Cass is filled to brim as his sucks off party goers while two dicks fill his asshole at the same time. The double penetration just seems too easy for this slut, so his back is coated in hot wax. His tormentors cover him in load after load of hot cum as his balls receive a punishing vice grip. Just when Cass thinks it's his turn to cum, Sebastian arrives with his flogger...
title: Cass Bolton's Folsom Street Fair Orgy Continues!
